title: Garth Crooks' Team of the Week: Ronaldo, Diaz, Eriksen, Yarmolenko, Rudiger
description: Who got Garth into trouble at the petrol station? Which striker might be a good buy for Arsenal? Find out in Garth Crooks' latest Team of the Week.

title: Bafta Film Awards: Jane Campion's The Power of the Dog wins top prize
description: The film, starring Benedict Cumberbatch as a complicated cowboy, won best film and best director.

title: War in Ukraine: What happened on day 18 of Russia's invasion
description: A military base near the Polish border is attacked, and the UK announces a scheme to house refugees.

title: Poland feels the strain of Ukraine's refugees
description: The eastern town of Zamosc has welcomed thousands of refugees but locals wonder how long they can cope.

title: Brent Renaud: Friend of US journalist killed in Ukraine speaks to BBC
description: Mea last spoke to Brent four days ago, and says he was excited to work on a documentary in Ukraine.

title: 'No doubt I'll stay until end of season' - Tuchel pledges future as Chelsea taking things 'day by day'
description: Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel says he and his players should fight for everyone at the club after insisting he'll stay at least "until the end of the season".

title: Matt Dawson column: England’s Ireland loss is gold dust for World Cup
description: Ex-England scrum-half Matt Dawson explains why England's loss to Ireland is gold dust and how they might beat France on Saturday.

title: Why I want to share my home with a Ukrainian refugee
description: John Rutherford has already hosted two refugees, and is open to offering a room to a Ukrainian.

title: Rod Stewart: Videos prompts pothole DIY repair warning
description: A council urges people not to attempt road repairs themselves after the singer was filmed doing it.

title: War in Ukraine: Russian forces accused of abducting second mayor
description: The news comes as Ukraine says Russia is trying to create "pseudo-republics" to break up the country.

title: Ukraine war: UK households offered £350 a month for hosting refugees
description: There will also be £10,000 per refugee for local authorities, but critics say the plan falls short.

title: Ukraine: Ireland's 'priority is humanitarian' as it takes 5,500 refugees
description: 'Ireland has never experienced anything on this scale before', says Taoiseach Micheál Martin.

title: Scotland and Wales bid to be refugee super sponsors
description: The first ministers want Ukrainians to be housed quickly and given help with safeguarding and services.

title: Irbil attack: Missiles from Iran hit northern Iraqi city, US says
description: The missiles damaged buildings near the US consulate in Irbil, but no casualties have been reported.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: 'A phenomenal hat-trick and a staggering performance' - Alan Shearer analysis
description: Cristiano Ronaldo's performance against Tottenham shows why Manchester United would be worse off without him, says MOTD pundit Alan Shearer.

title: Six Nations Magic: Excellent tries, big hits and best moments from round four
description: Relive the great tries, big hits and funny moments from round four of the Six Nations as Wales come up short against France, Scotland thrash Italy and Ireland defeat 14-man England.

title: Naomi Osaka in tears after being heckled mid-game
description: Former world number one Naomi Osaka is brought to tears by a heckler during her 6-0 6-4 defeat by Veronika Kudermetova at Indian Wells.

title: British food: How traditional firms are faring under pressure
description: Stilton and pork pie makers have survived for centuries - but what does the future hold?

title: Liverpool schools: The parents tackling admission policies
description: Hundreds of Liverpool parents could appeal after their children failed to get into their chosen schools.

title: Michael Conlan 'all good' after Leigh Wood retains world title with brutal knockout
description: Leigh Wood produces a brutal last-round knockout of Michael Conlan to retain his WBA featherweight title amid worrying scenes.

title: Northumberland farm welcomes five-legged lamb
description: It is the second time Whitehouse Farm in Northumberland has had a lamb with an extra limb.

title: PGI status: Could Welsh leeks become the new Cornish pasty?
description: The humble vegetable could be about to join the likes of Cheddar Cheese and Cornish Pasties.

title: The Papers: £350 a month refugee plan and plea to help orphans
description: The new scheme that will allow people in the UK to host Ukrainian refugees dominates the front pages.

title: Russia faces brain drain as thousands flee abroad
description: Many Russians who can afford it have fled to nearby countries since Russia invaded Ukraine.

title: Russia sanctions: How the measures have changed daily life
description: Prices are rising in Russia and some goods are harder to buy. Here are ways sanctions are affecting daily life.

title: Dudula: How South African anger has focused on foreigners
description: Support seems to be growing for two groups who are campaigning against undocumented foreign nationals.

title: Isak Munda: The Orissa labourer who became a YouTube star
description: Isak Munda says the platform has changed his life since he started posting videos.

title: Indian evacuee: The kindness of Ukrainians saved my life
description: From an airstrike bunker to his mum's relieved hugs, Vishnu tells how he and his dog fled Ukraine to India.

title: 'Without TikTok, I'd still be a wedding singer'
description: The video-sharing platform's new SoundOn service will let people distribute their own music.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'urban landscape'
description: A selection of striking images from our readers around the world.

title: Xenotransplantation: Are pigs the future of organ transplants?
description: After a series of medical breakthroughs, will these animals solve the global shortage of organs?

title: Boss accused of defrauding blind workers' pensions
description: Blind staff at failed 168-year-old business say they are owed pay, redundancy and furlough money.

title: Will Russia's attack on Ukraine help thaw US-Venezuela relations?
description: The ban on Russian oil exports is causing prices to surge, and leaders are revisiting some awkward friendships.

title: Ukraine: 'Not all Russians support this war'

title: The first sex worker strike: 'We are just women and mothers'
